fields.description:
The following error log was seen with simpleworkflow task polling during shutdown:

{code}
Tue Jul 18 16:33:47 2017 ERROR [AbstractTaskPolledNotificationChecker:eucalyptus-bootstrap-servicecontext-common-worker-811] Error checking for pending tasks
java.sql.SQLException: org.logicalcobwebs.proxool.ProxoolException: Attempt to refer to a unregistered pool by its alias 'eucalyptus_shared'
        at org.logicalcobwebs.proxool.ProxoolDriver.connect(ProxoolDriver.java:109)
        at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(DriverManager.java:664)
        at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(DriverManager.java:270)
        at org.hibernate.proxool.internal.ProxoolConnectionProvider.getConnection(ProxoolConnectionProvider.java:76)
        at org.hibernate.internal.AbstractSessionImpl$NonContextualJdbcConnectionAccess.obtainConnection(AbstractSessionImpl.java:380)
        at org.hibernate.engine.jdbc.internal.LogicalConnectionImpl.obtainConnection(LogicalConnectionImpl.java:228)
 [wrapped] org.hibernate.exception.GenericJDBCException: Could not open connection
        at org.hibernate.exception.internal.StandardSQLExceptionConverter.convert(StandardSQLExceptionConverter.java:54)
        at org.hibernate.engine.jdbc.spi.SqlExceptionHelper.convert(SqlExceptionHelper.java:126)
        at org.hibernate.engine.jdbc.spi.SqlExceptionHelper.convert(SqlExceptionHelper.java:112)
        at org.hibernate.engine.jdbc.internal.LogicalConnectionImpl.obtainConnection(LogicalConnectionImpl.java:235)
        at org.hibernate.engine.jdbc.internal.LogicalConnectionImpl.getConnection(LogicalConnectionImpl.java:171)
        at org.hibernate.engine.transaction.internal.jdbc.JdbcTransaction.doBegin(JdbcTransaction.java:67)
        at org.hibernate.engine.transaction.spi.AbstractTransactionImpl.begin(AbstractTransactionImpl.java:162)
        at org.hibernate.internal.SessionImpl.beginTransaction(SessionImpl.java:1471)
        at org.hibernate.jpa.internal.TransactionImpl.begin(TransactionImpl.java:61)
 [wrapped] javax.persistence.PersistenceException: org.hibernate.exception.GenericJDBCException: Could not open connection
        at org.hibernate.jpa.spi.AbstractEntityManagerImpl.convert(AbstractEntityManagerImpl.java:1763)
        at org.hibernate.jpa.spi.AbstractEntityManagerImpl.convert(AbstractEntityManagerImpl.java:1677)
        at org.hibernate.jpa.spi.AbstractEntityManagerImpl.throwPersistenceException(AbstractEntityManagerImpl.java:1771)
        at org.hibernate.jpa.internal.TransactionImpl.begin(TransactionImpl.java:64)
        at com.eucalyptus.entities.Entities$CascadingTx$TxState.begin(Entities.java:1406)
        at com.eucalyptus.entities.Entities$CascadingTx.begin(Entities.java:1236)
        at com.eucalyptus.entities.Entities.createTransaction(Entities.java:240)
        at com.eucalyptus.entities.Entities.get(Entities.java:265)
        at com.eucalyptus.entities.Entities.transactionFor(Entities.java:404)
        at com.eucalyptus.simpleworkflow.stateful.ActivityTaskPolledNotificationChecker.hasTasks(ActivityTaskPolledNotificationChecker.java:40)
        at com.eucalyptus.simpleworkflow.stateful.AbstractTaskPolledNotificationChecker.apply(AbstractTaskPolledNotificationChecker.java:49)
        at com.eucalyptus.simpleworkflow.stateful.ActivityTaskPolledNotificationChecker.apply(ActivityTaskPolledNotificationChecker.java:30)
        at com.eucalyptus.simpleworkflow.stateful.AbstractTaskPolledNotificationChecker.apply(AbstractTaskPolledNotificationChecker.java:30)
        at com.google.common.base.Predicates$OrPredicate.apply(Predicates.java:416)
        at com.eucalyptus.simpleworkflow.stateful.PolledNotificationService$1.apply(PolledNotificationService.java:65)
        at com.eucalyptus.simpleworkflow.stateful.PolledNotificationService$1.apply(PolledNotificationService.java:62)
        at com.eucalyptus.simpleworkflow.stateful.PolledNotificationService.checkNotify(PolledNotificationService.java:100)
